Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

MemberId.description: This is the identifier for the member within the collection.
MemberId.longDescription: The value of this string shall uniquely identify the member within the collection.  For services supporting Redfish v1.6 or higher, this value shall be the zero-based array index.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PercentCurrent.description: The Current percentage value for this AC Input.
PercentCurrent.longDescription: This property shall indicate the Current percentage value of this AC Input.

AcInputActions.description: The available actions for this resource.
AcInputActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Chiller.description: This is the schema definition for a Chiller.
Chiller.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a Chiller for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ACVoltage.description: Contains the array of 1 or more ACVoltage sensors.
ACVoltage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure AC voltage.

AcInput.description: This is the definition for AcInput.
AcInput.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for AcInput for a Redfish implementation.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AlarmPresent.description: The actual Alarm Present status of Chiller.
AlarmPresent.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Alarm Present boolean value of Chiller.

Alarms.description: Contains the naivgation pointer to the equipment Alarm collection.
Alarms.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type AlarmCollection that contains the alarms for the equipment.

Amperage.description: Contains the array of 1 or more amperage sensors.
Amperage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure amperage.

AssetTag.description: The actual Asset Tag of Chiller.
AssetTag.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Asset Tag of Chiller.

CHWIsolationValve.description: The actual CHW Isolation Valve setting of Chiller.
CHWIsolationValve.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual CHW Isolation Valve setting of Chiller.

CHWIsolationValveProof.description: The actual CHW Isolation Valve Proof setting of Chiller.
CHWIsolationValveProof.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual CHW Isolation Valve Proof setting of Chiller.

CWIsolationValve.description: The actual CW Isolation Valve setting of Chiller.
CWIsolationValve.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual CW Isolation Valve setting of Chiller.

CWIsolationValveProof.description: The actual CHW Isolation Valve Proof setting of Chiller.
CWIsolationValveProof.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual CHW Isolation Valve Proof setting of Chiller.

ChilledWaterFlowSetPoint.description: The actual Chilled Water Flow Set Point in GPM of Chiller.
ChilledWaterFlowSetPoint.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Chilled Water Flow Set Point of Chiller.

ChilledWaterFlowStatus.description: The actual Chilled Water Flow Status [FLOW/NO FLOW] of Chiller.
ChilledWaterFlowStatus.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Chilled Water Flow Status [FLOW/NO FLOW] of Chiller.

ChilledWaterPumpStartStop.description: The actual Chilled Water Start/Stop Command value of Chiller.
ChilledWaterPumpStartStop.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Chilled WaterStart/Stop Command value of Chiller.

ChilledWaterPumpStatus.description: The actual Chilled Water Pump Status of Chiller.
ChilledWaterPumpStatus.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Chilled Water Pump Status (binary) of Chiller.

ChilledWaterSetPoint.description: The actual Chilled Water Set Point of Chiller.
ChilledWaterSetPoint.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Chilled Water Set Point of Chiller.

ChillerAvailability.description: The actual Availability value of Chiller.
ChillerAvailability.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Availability value of Chiller.

ChillerCapacity.description: The actual Capacity percentage value of Chiller.
ChillerCapacity.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Capacity percentage value of Chiller.

ChillerEnableDisable.description: The actual Enable/Disable Command value of Chiller.
ChillerEnableDisable.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Enable/Disable Command value of Chiller.

ChillerRunTime.description: The actual Run Time of Chiller.
ChillerRunTime.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Run Time in hours of Chiller.

ChillerRunningStatus.description: The actual Chiller Running Status [ON/OFF] of Chiller.
ChillerRunningStatus.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Chiller Running Status [ON/OFF] of Chiller.

ChillerStartStop.description: The actual Start/Stop Command value of Chiller.
ChillerStartStop.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Start/Stop Command value of Chiller.

ColdWaterFlowSetPoint.description: The actual Cold Water Flow Set Point of Chiller.
ColdWaterFlowSetPoint.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Cold Water Flow Set Point of Chiller.

ColdWaterFlowStatus.description: The actual Cold Water Flow Status [FLOW/NO FLOW] of Chiller.
ColdWaterFlowStatus.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Cold Water Flow Status [FLOW/NO FLOW] of Chiller.

ColdWaterPumpStartStop.description: The actual Cold Water Start/Stop Command value of Chiller.
ColdWaterPumpStartStop.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Cold Water Start/Stop Command value of Chiller.

ColdWaterPumpStatus.description: The actual Cold Water Pump Status of Chiller.
ColdWaterPumpStatus.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Cold Water Pump Status (binary) of Chiller.

CompressorDischargeTempSensorAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Discharge Temperature Sensor Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorDischargeTempSensorAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Discharge Temperature Sensor Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorHighPressureAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor High Pressure Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorHighPressureAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor High Pressure Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorHighPressureTransitionFailure.description: The actual Compressor High Pressure Transition Failure status of Chiller.
CompressorHighPressureTransitionFailure.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor High Pressure Transition Failure boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorLossAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Loss Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorLossAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Loss Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorLossMasterAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Loss Master Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorLossMasterAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Loss Master Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorLowPressureAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Low Pressure Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorLowPressureAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Low Pressure Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorLowPressureTransitionFailure.description: The actual Compressor Low Pressure Transition Failure status of Chiller.
CompressorLowPressureTransitionFailure.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Low Pressure Transition Failure boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorMaintenanceAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Maintenance Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorMaintenanceAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Maintenance Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorOverTemperatureAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Over Temperature Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorOverTemperatureAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Over Temperature Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorPumpDownAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Pump Down Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorPumpDownAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Pump Down Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorRunTime.description: The actual Compressor Run Time of Chiller.
CompressorRunTime.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Run Time in hours of Chiller.

CompressorRunTimeAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Run Time Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorRunTimeAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Run Time Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorShortCycleAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Short Cycle Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorShortCycleAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Short Cycle Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CompressorStatus.description: The actual Compressor Status [ON/OFF] of Chiller.
CompressorStatus.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Compressor Status [ON/OFF] of Chiller.

CompressorThermalOverloadAlarmOn.description: The actual Compressor Thermal Overload Alarm On status of Chiller.
CompressorThermalOverloadAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Compressor Thermal Overload Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CondensorAlarmOn.description: The actual Condensor Alarm On status of Chiller.
CondensorAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Condensor Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

CondensorVoltageSurgeAlarmOn.description: The actual Condensor Voltage Surge Alarm On status of Chiller.
CondensorVoltageSurgeAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Condensor Voltage Surge Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

ControlMode.description: The actual Control Mode binary value of Chiller.
ControlMode.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Control Mode binary value of Chiller.

ControlMode2.description: The actual Control Mode of Chiller.
ControlMode2.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Control Mode of Chiller.

CyclingCode.description: The actual Cycling Code of Chiller.

DateOfManufacture.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual date of manufacture of Chiller.

DemandLimitSetPoint.description: The actual Demand Limit Set Point of Chiller.
DemandLimitSetPoint.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Demand Limit Set Point of Chiller.

FirmwareRevision.description: The actual Firmware Revision of Chiller.
FirmwareRevision.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Firmware Rev of Chiller.

HardwareRevision.description: The actual Hardware Revision of Chiller.
HardwareRevision.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Hardware Rev of Chiller.

Humidity.description: Contains the array of 1 or more humidity sensors.
Humidity.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure humidity.

LastDiagnostic.description: The actual Last Diagnostic of Chiller.
LastDiagnostic.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Last Diagnostic (binary) of Chiller.

MakeUpWaterAlarmOn.description: The actual Make Up Water Alarm On status of Chiller.
MakeUpWaterAlarmOn.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Make Up Water Alarm On boolean value of Chiller.

MakeUpWaterPumpStartStop.description: The actual Start/Stop Command value of Chiller.
MakeUpWaterPumpStartStop.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Start/Stop Command value of Chiller.

Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Manufacturer of Chiller.

Model.description: The actual Model Number of Chiller.
Model.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Model Number of Chiller.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OperatingCode.description: The actual Operating Code of Chiller.
OperatingCode.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Operating Code of Chiller.

OperatingMode.description: The actual Operating Mode of Chiller.
OperatingMode.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Operating Mode of Chiller.

PartNumber.description: The actual Part Number of Chiller.
PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Part Number of Chiller.

PhysicalLocation.description: The actual Physical Location of Chiller.
PhysicalLocation.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Physical Location of Chiller.

Pressure.description: Contains the array of 1 or more pressure sensors.
Pressure.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure pressure.

RemoteReset.description: The actual Remote Diagnostic Reset Command Status of Chiller.
RemoteReset.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Remote Diagnostic Reset Command Status of Chiller.

SafetyCode.description: The actual Safety Code of Chiller.
SafetyCode.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Safety Code of Chiller.

Sensors.description: The naivgation pointer to the collection of sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.
Sensors.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type SensorCollection that contains the sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.

SerialNumber.description: The actual Serial Number of Chiller.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Serial Number of Chiller.

Setpoints.description: Contains the array of 1 or more sensors that have setpoints.
Setpoints.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that have setpoints.

ShutdownAlarmPresent.description: The actual Shutdown Alarm Present status of Chiller.
ShutdownAlarmPresent.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Shutdown Alarm Present boolean value of Chiller.

StartCount.description: The actual Start Count of Chiller.
StartCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Start Count of Chiller.

StartSwitch.description: The actual Start Switch setting of Chiller.
StartSwitch.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Start Switch setting of Chiller.

Temperature.description: Contains the array of 1 or more temperature sensors.
Temperature.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure temperature.

TriggeredAlarms.description: Contains the array of 0 or more triggered alarms.
TriggeredAlarms.longDescription: This array shall contain the set of Members of the Alarm Collection which have an 'AlarmStatus' of 'Triggered'.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.
